channel.title: Project Management on Victor Van Gestel – Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Project Management on Victor Van Gestel – Developer

item.title: Webdeveloper
item.description:
• Designed end‑to‑end workflows for analytics and reporting, making it significantly easier for non‑technical users to understand product performance.
  • Ran lightweight discovery and usability sessions, feeding insights directly into prioritization and roadmap discussions.
  • Created a shared library of interaction patterns, empty states, and error messages, improving consistency across multiple teams.
